chunk:
Event
Description
DevFest 2023, which is short for "Developer Festival," is a yearly tech event organized by Google Developers Groups.
At DevFest, you can meet other tech enthusiasts , learn new things, and stay updated on the latest tech trends.
questions: What is DevFest 2023?
Who organizes DevFest 2023?
What can attendees do at DevFest 2023?
What kind of tech enthusiasts can be found at DevFest 2023?
What are some of the latest tech trends discussed at DevFest 2023?

chunk:
Event
format and timeline
Devfest’23 will be divided into two parts: Challenges happening online on October 19, where you can tackle tech problems and learn and the second part Hackathon on November 30, where you can code, create, and compete.
questions: What type of event is Devfest'23?
When will the Challenges portion of Devfest'23 take place?
What type of activities will be available during the Hackathon portion of Devfest'23?
What is the timeline for Devfest'23?
What is the purpose of Devfest'23?

chunk:
Event
Participants number
The Challenges part, which takes place on October 19th, allows an unlimited number of participants to join online.
For the Hackathon on November 30, we are expecting 100 participants to compete and showcase their technical skills.

chunk:
Event Hackathon
Registration
Registration for DevFest 2023 is simple and convenient. Follow these steps to secure your spot:
- Visit our official Devfest’23 website throughout the link : providing the link 
- Click on the "Register Now" button to start the registration process.
- You will be guided through the registration form where you can select to register for the hackathon. 
- Once your registration is complete, you will receive a confirmation email whether you are accepted or not, with more details about devfest’23.
